description:
While walking through a residential neighborhood in Koneru after finishing a job, Kogoro hears a scream. He follows the scream and finds a man named Esaka Ritsuo sitting on the ground. Apparently someone pushed his back while he was waiting for the signal to change and was nearly hit by a car. At the detective agency, Conan and Kogoro listen to Esaka`s story. He has lost his memories from the past year and believes he may have done something to incur someone`s enmity during that time...
Source: crunchyroll
